FuncDef: This command is used to redirect PW packets to an egress port queue-group for the purpose of shaping.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the network policy identification. The value uniquely identifies the policy on the system. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies the name of the queue group template up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies the optional identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 40960.
